title: Clinical Information Extraction with Large Language Models: A Case Study on Organ Procurement
details: H Adam, J Lin, J Lin, H Keenan, A Wilson, M Ghassemi - AMIA Annual Symposium …, 2025
abstract: Recent work has demonstrated that large language models (LLMs) are powerful tools for clinical information extraction from unstructured text. However, existing approaches have largely ignored the extraction of numeric information such as …
